verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%>, go up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el, and live <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H6213><s%>: and make there an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God <S%H410><s%>, that appeared <S%H7200><s%> to you when you fled <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>.

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his household <S%H1004><s%>, and to all that were with him <S%H5493><s%>, Put away the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> that are among you <S%H8432><s%>, and be clean <S%H2891><s%>, and change <S%H2498><s%> your garments <S%H8071><s%>:

And let us arise <S%H6965><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> to God <S%H410><s%>, who answered <S%H6030><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress <S%H6869><s%>, and was with me in the way <S%H1870><s%> which I went <S%H1980><s%>.

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> all the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which were in their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all their earrings <S%H5141><s%> which were in their ears <S%H241><s%>; and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> them under the oak <S%H424><s%> which was by Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>: and the terror <S%H2847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was upon the cities <S%H5892><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H7291><s%>, and they did not pursue after <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Luz <S%H3870><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, that is <S%H1008><s%>, Beth–el, he and all the people that were with him <S%H5971><s%>.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> El <S%H416><s%>–beth–el: because there God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H1540><s%> to him <S%H1272><s%>, when he fled from the face <S%H6440><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%>.

But Deborah <S%H1683><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>'s nurse <S%H3243><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and she was buried <S%H6912><s%> beneath Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el under an oak <S%H437><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of it was called <S%H7121><s%> Allon <S%H439><s%>–bachuth.
And God <S%H430><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> again <S%H935><s%>, when he came out of Padan <S%H6307><s%>–aram, and blessed him <S%H1288><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H8034><s%>, your name is Jacob <S%H3290><s%>: your name <S%H8034><s%> shall not be called <S%H7121><s%> any more Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, but Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be your name <S%H8034><s%>: and he called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him <S%H410><s%>, I am God Almighty <S%H7706><s%>: be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> and a company <S%H6951><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be of you and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of your body <S%H2504><s%>;

And the land <S%H776><s%> which I gave <S%H5414><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, to you I will give it <S%H5414><s%>, and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you <S%H310><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from him in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he talked with him <S%H1696><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set up <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where he talked <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H4678><s%>, even a pillar of stone <S%H68><s%>: and he poured <S%H5258><s%> a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> on it and he poured <S%H3332><s%> oil on it <S%H8081><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> where God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with him <S%H1008><s%>, Beth–el.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Beth <S%H1008><s%>–el; and there was but <S%H5750><s%> a little <S%H3530><s%> way <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%>: and Rachel <S%H7354><s%> travailed <S%H3205><s%>, and she had hard <S%H7185><s%> labor <S%H3205><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7185><s%>, when she was in hard labor <S%H3205><s%>, that the midwife <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her <S%H3372><s%>, Fear not <S%H1121><s%>; you shall have this son also.

And it came to pass <S%H5315><s%>, as her soul was in departing <S%H3318><s%>, (for she died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H99999><s%>) that she called his name <S%H8034><s%> Ben <S%H1126><s%>–oni: but his father <S%H1><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> him Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>.
And Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%>, which is Beth <S%H1035><s%>–lehem.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> a pillar <S%H4676><s%> upon her grave <S%H6900><s%>: that is the pillar <S%H4678><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s grave <S%H6900><s%> to this day <S%H3117><s%>.
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%>, and spread <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> beyond <S%H1973><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Edar <S%H4029><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3478><s%>, when Israel lived <S%H7931><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>, that Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s concubine <S%H6370><s%>: and Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H1121><s%>. Now the sons of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%>:

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah <S%H3812><s%>; Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, and Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>:
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>:
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%>; Dan <S%H1835><s%>, and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>:

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%>, Leah <S%H3812><s%>'s handmaid <S%H8198><s%>; Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Asher <S%H836><s%>: these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in Padan <S%H6307><s%>–aram.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> to Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, to the city of Arbah <S%H7153><s%>, which is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, where Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> stayed <S%H1481><s%>.
And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighty <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> gave up the Spirit <S%H1478><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people <S%H5971><s%>, being old <S%H2205><s%> and full <S%H7649><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>: and his sons <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> buried him <S%H6912><s%>.
